TopicTitle: Anyone have engine specs in a spreadsheet?

Articles.Content:
I'm playing with balance on the MH engines and needed all the stock engines as a reference. Before I re-invented the wheel (rocket engine?) I thought i'd check. I know it's on KSP Wiki in a web chart, but was looking for Excel or Google Sheets so I could run calculations and make changes.

Thanks.

 

 

Edited April 5, 2018 by Tyko

just copy the table from the wiki and try pasting in excel it might work... [snip]
